response.summary: Hey there! I'm George, I'm a Mechatronic Engineer, Robotics is my greatest passion it has driven me to explore new and innovative ways of leveraging these technologies to transform businesses. Currently, I lead a highly skilled Machine Learning team that is focused on Cognitive Document Analysis using CV and NLP. With previous experience leading an AI and Robotics team and working as a Robotic designer.
response.skills: Artificial Neural Networks, Computer Science, Intelligent document processing (IDP) , IDP, Langchain, Team Leadership, Natural Language Processing (NLP), Large Language Models (LLM), Computer Vision, Product Design, phyton, Creativity Skills, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Python (Programming Language), Data Science, Strategic Planning, Data Analysis, Open-Source Software, Software as a Service (SaaS)

profile_positions.description: As the Cognitive Document Analysis Team Lead, I am responsible for developing and implementing tools for OCR, text segmentation, document layout structuring, Named Entity Recognition, and understanding and generating models (NLP - LLM). My team and I automate pipelines for document processing (IDP) , primarily for customer requests, complaints, and claims
profile_positions.title: Cognitive Document Analysis Team Lead

profile_positions.description: As an NLP Engineer, I developed chatbots, voicebots, and implemented tools such as text-to-speech models and other internal ones, using my skills in Python, NLP, and ML. I contributed to enhancing the customer experience and gained expertise in developing innovative solutions.
profile_positions.title: NLP Engineer

profile_positions.description: As AI & Robotics Team Lead, I oversaw project development and implementation, utilizing my expertise in systems design, and robotics, and gaining team leadership, and project management experience. I provided technical and non-technical guidance, ensuring successful project development, and fostering a collaborative environment.
profile_positions.title: Artificial intelligence and robotics Team lead

profile_positions.description: As a Research and Development Engineer on Artificial Intelligence & Robotics team, I served as the head product designer for a range of innovative devices including mobile robots, drones, and facial recognition devices. My role involved utilizing my skills in electromechanics, hardware development, systems design, robotics, and prototyping to create cutting-edge products.
profile_positions.title: Research And Development Engineer
Teacher assitant: Taller de Proyectos intrdiciplinarios
Auxiliar proceso de acreditación Ingeniería Mecatrónica

profile_positions.description: Design and manufacturing of an underwater sample collection system for the research group of Prof. Bas. Ibelings at the University of Geneva.
profile_positions.title: Subaquatic Sampler Prototype Development

company.name: SamiBot
company.description: SamiBot is a Robotic Tech Enabler for restaurants around the world. We are building an integral solution that includes hardware and software on a package deal that truly enables our clients to automate waiter tasks. We want to be Colombia's first major RSP (Robotic Service Provider) to allow our B2B customers to increase their average ticket per customer in their restaurants. Our product is offered on a monthly-subscription fee that has three major components to offer our Robotics as a Service’. These are: our Bots Manager (software), the robot (hardware and software), and tech support.
